gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 122, Spurs 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Spurs, 122-116. Nikola Vucevic (24 points, 16 rebounds, five assists) led Chicago as Ayo Dosunmo (21 points, four assists) and DeMar DeRozan (20 points, four rebounds, four assists) totaled 41 points. Tre Jones led the Spurs with a career-high 30 points, along with nine rebounds and four assists while Keldon Johnson added 26 points, four rebounds, and five assists. Chicago improves to 19-22 as the Spurs move to 7-31.
